GUANTANAMO BAY NAVAL BASE , Cuba - President Donald Trump 's incendiary remarks about military justice stirred a dramatic exchange in a hearing Thursday for the [V: accused] [ARG1: conspirators] of the 9/11 attacks , with defense lawyers arguing that the commander - in - chief exerted unlawful influence .
